title: Cara Delevingne is unveiled as the face of Dior's fine jewellery collections with chic BTS shots
text:
She's a multi-talented star, who can act, model and sing.

And now, Cara Delevingne, 27, has been unveiled as the face of Dior's fine jewellery collections, Dior Joaillerie, with sensational black-and-white BTS portraits shot by Alexi Pissourios.

The model proves her modelling prowess in the sleek snaps, while showcasing her fun, quirky personality in a short film accompanying the campaign.

Wow! Cara Delevingne, 27, has been unveiled as the face of Dior's fine jewellery collections, with sensational black-and-white shots in which she showcases her modelling prowess

The British born talent looked divine in the artistic photographs, which saw her adorned with an array of the delicate new collection, while wearing clean-cut clothing.

For three of the four images, Cara was dressed in black attire, with her short locks styled into dishevelled waves.

A particularly sleek photo saw the Paper Towns actress slip into a fitted white blazer, while a stylist arranged a bracelet on her wrist to capture the perfect snap.

The model, who is in a relationship with actress Ashley Benson, let her natural beauty and power brows do the talking, with a minimal make-up look.

Perfected: A particularly sleek photo saw the Paper Towns actress slip into a fitted white blazer, while a stylist arranged a bracelet on her wrist to capture the perfect snap

Sleek: For three of the four images, Cara was dressed in black attire, with her short locks styled into dishevelled waves

The short colourful film which accompanies the campaign captured Cara's more playful side, showing her juggle giant versions of gorgeous pendants from the jewellery pieces.

Cara is in a relationship with actress Ashley Benson; the duo have been dating since May 2018 after they met on the film Her Smell.

They have been seen rocking matching bands on their ring fingers.

The duo were reported to have wed in early August in Little Las Vegas chapel in an Elvis-themed ceremony, according to The Sun on Sunday.

Fun! The short film which accompanies the campaign captured Cara's more playful side, showing her juggle giant versions of gorgeous pendants from the jewellery pieces

Gorgeous: The official campaign shots show Cara in a more colourful light

The chapel's owner told the publication: 'They were sure about what they are doing and they were sure about what they mean to each other.'

However, according to E! News, Cara and Ashley are not married, but simply had a friendship ceremony.

The outlet reported that no marriage license for the two stars was found in the Las Vegas public records.
